name: Velvet & Walnut Armchair - Chocolate
description: Introduce rich soft-to-touch velvet to your interiors with our Velvet & Walnut Armchair. Upholstered in luxurious velvet, sitting on a walnut-stained timber frame. The elegant chocolate coloured velvet is interiors new ultra-luxe neutral fabric. The classic slim mid-century silhouette is complimented with a plush seat created using the highest quality foam padding. Designed to offer comfort without the bulk.
